results.title: They Were Protectors in Afghanistan. Now They Need Help.

results.title: Sardinian Village Tries to Save an Ancient Tree Scorched by Fire

results.abstract: Here’s what we know about booster shots — why Americans may need them and when they should get them.
results.byline: By Sharon LaFraniere, Apoorva Mandavilli, Sheryl Gay Stolberg, Erica L. Green, Emily Anthes and Noah Weiland

results.title: Resistance fighters drive Taliban from 3 districts in the mountains north of Kabul.
results.abstract: The Taliban faced the first armed challenge from former Afghan soldiers and villagers in the mountains north of Kabul.
